alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Coles; Cumberland; Douglas; Effingham; Jasper; Macon; Moultrie; Piatt; Shelby (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 6:40AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Coles, Moultrie, northwestern Jasper, eastern Shelby, southern Piatt, Cumberland, southwestern Champaign, Douglas, Effingham and southeastern Macon Counties through 730 AM CDT... At 639 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Long Creek to near Watson. Movement was northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Dieterich and Hammond around 650 AM CDT. Montrose around 655 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Jewett, Toledo, Tolono, Greenup, Janesville and Savoy. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 between mile markers 144 and 229. Interstate 70 between mile markers 83 and 126. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Champaign; Coles; Cumberland; Douglas; Effingham; Jasper; Macon; Moultrie; Piatt; Shelby
